name: Kenshin Dragon Quest: Yomigaerishi Densetsu no Tsurugi
storyline: The stage is Alefgard continent. The ball of light that protected this land was stolen by the Dragon King, and the world was plunged into darkness! Furthermore, it is said that Princess Lola has been kidnapped from Radatome Castle, which rules this land! After receiving Lot's sword from the spirit Rubis, you set out on an adventure with your partner Momo-tan to save the continent of Alefgard!
summary:
"Kenshin Dragon Quest: Yomigaerishi Densetsu no Tsurugi" is an experience game of the Dragon Quest series released in 2003.
It is a standalone game console using XaviX technology.
The content is an arrangement of the story of the first Dragon Quest, and you use a special Loto sword-shaped controller to slash your enemies.
